profile.name: Aleksander Lech
profile.title: Software Developer & Architect
profile.summary: I have graduated from the Gdansk University of Technology Faculty of Technical Physics and Applied Mathematics with Masters of Science, Engineer degree. I have started my professional career long time before the graduation. I used to work as a Java EE Developer as a contractor. During my 10 years’ experience I have been given an opportunity to participate in many interesting projects for various sectors.  I like digging into technology related topics, solving difficult problems as well as supporting other team mates. That’s why I always used to prefer architect roles that gave me possibility to test new technologies as well as develop API’s and frameworks. I am a passionate of functional programming and Android development after work. How can I help you?

projects.title: Software Engineer
projects.description: Public sector related projects (confidential). Project involves processing of huge amount of data.
activities: UI development involving Angular Material Design, Meteor and Node.js
Backend development in Node.js, Java 8, Spring
Analyzing production memory and performance problems
Support for Android team in developing native features

projects.title: Senior Java Developer / Scrum Master
projects.description: STEP is a huge Master Data Management solution developed by Stibo Systems and widely used across the world. As a part of R&D I develop so-called Automotive Vertical solution providing additional industry-specific features to the main product
activities: Create a framework for fast reading of huge table-based files used for NAPA and AutoCare file formats
Implement NAPA formats data import into the STEP
Scrum Master role

projects.title: Senior Java Developer
projects.description: Project GLOBE is a worldwide system for Hamburg Sued for contracts and shipment management. The system consists of many domain modules responsible for different business areas. I work in the Framework/Technology Base Team responsible for the system core features
activities: Implementing core modules for the system
Supporting other teams in technology problems
Investigate production memory leaks and performance problems

projects.title: System Architect
projects.description: Worked on a big company insurance platform called Atena Insurance Platform (AIP)
activities: Design and develop core system components; R&D
Solving performance problems
Application servers and CI maintenance

projects.title: IT Architect / Development Manager
projects.description: Support delivery process for a big mortgage system (MEx) developed by an external vendor.
activities: Version deployment technical coordination
Code review
Designing and implementing fixed price small projects for the bank using WebLogic and Oracle Service Bus middleware
Performed WebLogic administration training

projects.title: Senior Java EE Developer
projects.description: Implement a big back office system PartenonWeb for major insurance companies. Mainly responsible for the Sales Network module
activities: Full stack application development
Developing plugins in soapUI, Groovy and JXL to support testers
A technology research role. Researching new technologies to be adapted into entire system (including all modules) with project main architect

projects.title: IBM Business Modeler Developer
projects.description: A public-sector project for polish Police (e-Services).
activities: Design and implement business processes
Building webservice interfeaces in IBM Rational Software Architect

projects.title: Java/JS Developer
projects.description: Logistics and Vindication systems for ITI Neovision Poland. An International project held in client office.
activities: Designing and implementing documents print engine (Java SE) and templates
Implementing frontend IBM Business Space widgets in DOJO (Java Script)

projects.title: Java EE Developer
projects.description: Implementing and designing technical solution for a big system for Polish Ministry of Interior and Administration. The system was to manage and support polish electronic id`s.
activities: Implementing web services (top-down) using Java EE technology and IBM WebSphere Application Server 7
Coordinating work of a small team in Gdansk, checking code quality

projects.title: Java EE Developer
projects.description: BOSS – a new backoffice system for a big insurance company - Hestia - to manage their sales network
activities: Designing and implementing commission table related system using MVEL technologies
Implementing project domain objects using JPA technology with JPQL queries

projects.title: Java EE Developer
projects.description: Create a web application for SPEED transportation company to manage their shipping and truck transport
activities: Designing and implementing commission table related system using MVEL technologies
Implementing project domain objects using JPA technology with JPQL queries

projects.title: Java EE Developer
projects.description: Implement new Webservices and Business Logic for an existing system to support new AXA products

projects.title: Java ME Developer
projects.description: Create a rich mobile application for Onet company to enable their services on java mobile platform
activities: Implemented framework for resizable UI components Implemented Weather module
Implemented solution for video recording and sending content to server for further streaming

projects.title: Java SE/EE Developer/Architect
projects.description: Geopepper system. The system lets their users to place so-called GMS message in specific geofence that is delivered to recipient mobile while he reaches the fence
activities: Implemented MMS support with attachment upload
Designed and implemented separate system for commercial usage of geofencing technologies. Choosed newest available technologies like JBoss 5.0 and Java EE 5

projects.title: J2EE Developer
projects.description: Project “Finder”. Refactor and add some new features to the existing company system used for tracking their vehicles

projects.title: Symbian/C++/J2EE Developer
projects.description: Develop a mobile application for bank (Raiffeisen) customers to manage their accounts
activities: Implemented controls for an automatic IBAN formatting and saving/loading them from phone contacts using dedicated Symbian API

projects.title: Junior J2EE Developer
projects.description: Various company internal minor R&D projects
activities: Investigated possibilities of migration to the new EJB3.0 specification for internal company projects

projects.title: PHP Developer
projects.description: Created and deployed multiple CMS systems for various companies basing on Joomla solutions. For instance, Speednet and NOWAK
activities: Investigated possibilities of migration to the new EJB3.0 specification for internal company projects

initiatives.name: UBEO - “order without the queue!”
initiatives.description: Developed with other 3 teammates solution consists of 2 Android applications, Angular UI and REST services deployed in microservices concept and using NoSQL database. It also integrated Android Pay as well as other payments providers available in Poland. The project goal is to provide a modern solution for fast and comfortable products ordering in pubs/restaurants and what`s more, have fun while learning the newest trends/ technologies available :)
activities: Designed system architecture with microservices principles
Implemented payment system that on mobile and backend side that integrates external providers and Android Pay
Developed microservices, invoice, report system and supported mobile application development
Prepared gradle and CI configuration for the project

initiatives.name: Drive Assistant
initiatives.description: The application main feature is video, location and acceleration logging while driving a car. The recorded trips can be further played and searched for example by destination street name. Published to Google Play.
activities: Implemented custom MediaPlayer to suppport multiple videopart files synced with previously stored sensor data

initiatives.name: Around
initiatives.description: Co-owner of the awarded company focused on researching computer vision solutions. Participant of CEBIT.
activities: Implementing desktop applications for augumented reality using OpenCV, C++ and Qt
Implementing Android AR apps
Representing company at Cebit
Talking with customers

testimonials.name: Benjamin Toft Jakobsen
testimonials.quote: Aleksander Lech has been working for Stibo Systems since spring 2016 as a senior software developer and scrum master. Aleksander has managed to put a lot of structure on our project and he have done a great work with our integration to complex automotive formats, such as TecDoc, NAPA and AutoCare. He is a highly skilled developer, that always deliver high quality code, and improves all code he comes near. It has been a pleasure working with Aleksander, and I hereby give him my best recommendations.

testimonials.name: Jacek Wielich
testimonials.quote: Aleksander has excellent programming skills. His wide knowledge and big experience helped many times in solving difficult project issues. I can truly recommend Alex as a very proactive IT expert who can deal with any 'nightmare' level tasks.

testimonials.name: Maciej Gottfried
testimonials.quote: Skilled developer with very good OO thinking and Java knowledge. Terrific ideas especially in low level generic system layers. Valuable teammate, good social skills.
